name: aqua-suit
effect: Allows the player to ride Kyogre in the Cave of Origin.
short_effect: Allows the player to ride Kyogre in the Cave of Origin.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A suit made with the collective technological know-how of Team Aqua. It can withstand any impact.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A suit made with the collective technological know-how of Team Aqua. It can withstand any impact.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A suit made with the collective technological know-how of Team Aqua. It can withstand any impact.
